data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Hậu Giang, Vietnam with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hậu Giang, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Hậu Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary: On average, 131 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Hậu Giang, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, convict the 16,698 believers in Hậu Giang to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 16,698 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Arem people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, help the people of Hậu Giang, Vietnam to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Hậu Giang, Vietnam to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 755,302 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Hậu Giang, Vietnam has a population of 772,000.

We estimate Hậu Giang has 16,698 people who might know Jesus, 61,924 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 693,378 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Hậu Giang.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
